altername_name: Capcom Generation: Dai-4-shuu Kokou no Eiyuu
name: Capcom Generation: Dai 4 Shuu Kokou no Eiyuu
overview: Volume four of the Capcom Generation series, which includes three top-down shooter games ported from the arcade originals: Commando (Senjō no Ōkami) Gun.Smoke Mercs (Senjō no Ōkami II)
